con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="SAC_MFW_service" targetNamespace="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/SAC_MFW/" xmlns:bb="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/SAC_MFW/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/SAC_MFW/" xmlns:ns0="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <xsd:element name="getMFW"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="sac_id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MFW"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="version" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="ifs" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="company" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="time" type="xsd:dateTime" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Device"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="type" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="disabled" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BM"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="device_id" type="xsd:long"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="class" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="description" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="disabled" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Probe"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="bm_id" type="xsd:long"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="disabled" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getAvailability"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="sac_id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Availability"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="bb:Device"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="bb:BM"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="bb:Probe"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="mfw_id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BMResultRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="device_id" type="xsd:long"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="frequency" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BMResultsRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="bb:BMResultRequest"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="sac_id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ProbeParametersRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="probe_id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="sac_id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ProbeParameter"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="description" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="mandatory" type="xsd:boolean" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="value" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ProbeParameters"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="bb:ProbeParameter"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ProbeParameterValue"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="value" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ProbeParameterValues"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="bb:ProbeParameterValue"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="probe_id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="sac_id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="OperationResult"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="error" type="xsd:boolean" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="setProbeParametersResponse"> <wsdl:part element="bb:OperationResult" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getMFWRequest"> <wsdl:part element="bb:getMFW" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getAvailabilityResponse"> <wsdl:part element="bb:Availability" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getBMResultsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="bb:OperationResult" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="setProbeParametersRequest"> <wsdl:part element="bb:ProbeParameterValues" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getAvailabilityRequest"> <wsdl:part element="bb:getAvailability" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getMFWResponse"> <wsdl:part element="bb:MFW" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getProbeParametersRequest"> <wsdl:part element="bb:ProbeParametersRequest" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getBMResultsRequest"> <wsdl:part element="bb:BMResultsRequest" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getProbeParametersResponse"> <wsdl:part element="bb:ProbeParameters" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="SAC_MFW"> <wsdl:operation name="getMFW"> <wsdl:input message="bb:getMFWRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="bb:getMFWResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getBMResults"> <wsdl:input message="bb:getBMResultsRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="bb:getBMResultsResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getAvailability"> <wsdl:documentation>asks for new available BM.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="bb:getAvailabilityRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="bb:getAvailabilityResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getProbeParameters"> <wsdl:input message="bb:getProbeParametersRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="bb:getProbeParametersResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="setProbeParameters"> <wsdl:input message="bb:setProbeParametersRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="bb:setProbeParametersResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="SAC_MFW_SoapBinding" type="bb:SAC_MFW"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getMFW"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/SAC_MFW/getMFW"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getBMResults"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/SAC_MFW/getBMResults"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getAvailability"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/SAC_MFW/getAvailability"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getProbeParameters"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/SAC_MFW/getProbeParameters"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="setProbeParameters"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/SAC_MFW/setProbeParameters"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="SAC_MFW_service"> <wsdl:port binding="bb:SAC_MFW_SoapBinding" name="SAC_MFW"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:9876/SAC_MFW"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:part.con:content: <!--Created with Liquid XML Studio Developer Edition (Trial) 8.1.7.2743 (http://www.liquid-technologies.com)--> <wsdl:definitions name="MFW_SAC_service" targetNamespace="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/MFW_SAC/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:bb="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/MFW_SAC/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <!--This file describes the web services provided by the SAC and available to the MFW--> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/MFW_SAC/" xmlns:ns0="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <xsd:element name="SAC"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="version" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="IFs" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="company" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="time" type="xsd:dateTime" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getSAC"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="mfw_id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BMResult"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="error" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="value" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="timeStamp" type="xsd:dateTime" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BMResults"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="PerDevice"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="bb:BMResult"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="device_id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="mfw_id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="OperationResult"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="error" type="xsd:boolean" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Device"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="type" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="disabled" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BM"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="device_id" type="xsd:long"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="class" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="description" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="disabled" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Probe"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="bm_id" type="xsd:long"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/> <xsd:attribute name="disabled" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Availability"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="bb:Device"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="bb:BM"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="bb:Probe"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="mfw_id" type="xsd:long" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--global messages--> <wsdl:message name="getSACRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="bb:getSAC"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getSACResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="bb:SAC"/> </wsdl:message> <!--monitoring-related messages--> <wsdl:message name="setBMResultsRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="bb:BMResults"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="setBMResultsResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="bb:OperationResult"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="setAvailabilityRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="bb:Availability"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="setAvailabilityResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="bb:OperationResult"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="MFW_SAC"> <!--global operations--> <wsdl:operation name="getSAC"> <wsdl:input message="bb:getSACRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="bb:getSACResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <!--monitoring-related operations--> <wsdl:operation name="setBMResults"> <wsdl:input message="bb:setBMResultsRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="bb:setBMResultsResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="setAvailability"> <wsdl:documentation>receives new available BM.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="bb:setAvailabilityRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="bb:setAvailabilityResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="MFW_SAC_SoapBinding" type="bb:MFW_SAC"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <!--global services--> <wsdl:operation name="getSAC"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="getSACRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getSACResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--monitoring-related services--> <wsdl:operation name="setBMResults"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="setBMResultsRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="setBMResultsResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--modelling-related services--> <wsdl:operation name="setAvailability"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="setAvailabilityRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="setAvailabilityResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="MFW_SAC_service"> <wsdl:port name="MFW_SAC" binding="bb:MFW_SAC_SoapBinding"> <soap:address location="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/MFW_SAC/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sac="http://www.bugyobeyond.org/SAC_MFW/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <sac:ProbeParameterValues probe_id="${Properties#probeId}" sac_id="${#TestSuite#sacId}"> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <sac:ProbeParameterValue name="${Properties#name}" value="${Properties#value1}"/> </sac:ProbeParameterValues> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep: stop test probes
